item.description:
Let's meet this coming Tuesday eve to practice speaking Mandarin. If you're a beginner or conversational, feel free to indicate in your rsvp. We'll try to have some interesting practice for everyone. Hope you can join us!

Bring any books or homework you'd like to review!
BCNC is nearest to the Orange Line NEMC stop, turn right on Washington St out of the station and walk one block towards the South End, away from Chinatown. Turn Left on Oak St. and the first left on Ash St. The double glass doors is BCNC, sign in at the desk and ask for the Chinese conversation Meetup group.

For more information, see http://www.bcnc.net...

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Chinese Meetup- Tuesday eve, 2/21 6:30p
